title: Bouncy script font
content:
Hello,

I need help identifying this font for a client. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Cheers,

Randy

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [JustBecuzzLogo\_ResizedGR.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140811062242/http:/typophile.com/files/JustBecuzzLogo_ResizedGR.jpg) | 25.52 KB |
author: randy72

comments.content: Don't know that one, but speaking of [Bounce](http://web.archive.org/web/20140811062242/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/borges_lettering/bounce_script_regular/)...
Thanks guys. The fonts you suggested looked better than what my customer wanted to match, so hopefully I can sway them in a better direction!
